main event: Two civilian students observed a round silver object in the sky while outdoors in Charleston, South Carolina, on 15 July 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed for about five minutes,The object changed direction to the southeast and disappeared,The students reported seeing a zig-zag motion just before and after the course change,It was noted that the object emitted no sound and had no tail or trail,The observers were located on the campus of The Citadel during the sighting.
witness description: two students at The Citadel, age 21
